title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed between a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
OB: The datetime values displayed in the dynamic text item are in a different format than the datetime values displayed in the data/text item. The format in the dynamic text item is incorrect.
EB: The datetime values should have the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a text item, a data item, and a dynamic text item onto a page.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
3. Compare the format of the datetime values in both items.
